values: （时间，距离）遥远的，偏僻的；关系疏远的，冷淡的；相差很大的
A remote place is distant or far away.
He lived in a remote village in the Himalayas.

adjective, noun
Remote refers to something that is situated far away from any other place, out of the way, or distant.
